teaser: Airing on Monday, April 27, 2015: First up, we'll talk to David E. Sanger about hackers who gained access to President Obama’s email. Plus, Marketplace Tech producer Meg Cramer talks about a new documentary that takes a look at the gender gap in the tech industry.
description: Airing on Monday, April 27, 2015: First up, we'll talk to David E. Sanger about hackers who gained access to President Obama’s email. Plus, Marketplace Tech producer Meg Cramer talks about a new documentary that takes a look at the gender gap in the tech industry.
title: Marketplace Tech for Monday, April 27, 2015
